pageContent: Introduction: The Prouts Neck Meetings on Prostate Cancer began in 1985 through the efforts of the Organ Systems Branch of the National Cancer Institute to stimulate new research and focused around specific questions in prostate tumorigenesis and therapy.

metaData.source:
Prostate cancer: the new evidence base for diagnosis and treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18027255/
